required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Improving Neuroprotective Strategy for Ischemic Stroke With Sufficient Recanalization After Thrombectomy by Edaravone Dexborneol
clinical_study.official_title: Improving Neuroprotective Strategy for Ischemic Stroke With Sufficient Recanalization After Thrombectomy by Edaravone Dexborneol (INSIST-ED): a Prospective, Randomized, Double Blinded, Multi-centre Study
clinical_study.source: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

brief_summary.textblock: To explore the safety and efficacy of edaravone dexborneol for the treatment of acute ischemic stroke patients who received endovascular thrombectomy.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
Distribution of modified Rankin Score after the treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS)
secondary_outcome.description: the minimum and maximum values of NIHSS are 42 and 0, respectively; higher NIHSS mean a worse outcome
infarct volume is determinted by CT or DWI

other_outcome.description: sICH was defined as 4 or more increase in NIHSS caused by hemorrhage

other_outcome.measure: Proportion of intraparenchymal hemorrhage (PH1 and PH2)
other_outcome.description: Proportion of PH1 and PH2 within 48 hours after the treatment

arm_group.description: Intravenous injections of 0.9% NaCl BID for 12 ±2days.
Intravenous injections of edaravone dexborneol (37.5mg in 0·9% NaCl) BID for 12 ±2days.

intervention.description: Intravenous injections of edaravone dexborneol (37.5mg, dissolved in 100ml saline) twice a day for 12 ±2 days.

facility.name: General Hospital of Northern Theater Command

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region
